snippet.title: Shady Knight - Official Demo Launch Trailer | Realms Fest 2023
snippet.description: Shady Knight is a 3D first-person hack and slash platformer developed by Alexey 'cptnsigh'. Master intricate platforming levels littered with enemies to take down while utilizing momentum to reach new platforming heights with the use of your grapple chain. Slash enemies with your sword, dispatch enemies at range with your crossbow, and reach the end of the level to become the knight of the age. Shady Knight is launching in 2024 for PC with a demo available now.
